%
% @version $Revision: 1.1 $ $Date: 2004/04/27 09:39:35 $
%
% Test für Register real mit math expr
%
\catcode`\{=1 % left brace is begin-group character
\catcode`\}=2 % right brace is end-group character
%
%
7+5*2 = \mathexpr{7+5*2}

% 7+5/0 = \mathexpr{7+5/0}

%7+5*2+x+2+3 = \mathexpr{7+5*2+x+2+3}

sin(5) = \mathexpr{sin(5)}

sin(5) = \the\mathexpr{sin(5)}

\real7= \mathexpr{cos(50)}
cos(50) = \the\real7

\real8=\mathexpr{1*random()}
random = \the\real8

\count2000=\mathexpr{4*5}
4*5 = \the\count2000
